events.name: onChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's value changes. You can pull out the new value by accessing `event.target.value` (string).
events.description_zh: 元素的值更改时调用的处理程序。您可以通过访问“event.target.value”（字符串）来提取新值。

events.name: onValueChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the value changes.
events.description_zh: 值更改时调用的处理程序。

:label.description: The label of the radio group.

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

orientation.description: The orientation of the radio group.

name.description: The name of the RadioGroup, used when submitting an HTML form. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#name_and_radio_buttons).
name.description_zh: 提交 HTML 表单时使用的 RadioGroup 的名称。参见 [MDN]（https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#name_and_radio_buttons）。

:defaultValue.description_zh: 默认的选定值。（不受控制）。

isDisabled.description: Whether the radio group is disabled.
isDisabled.description_zh: 单选按钮组是否被禁用。

isRequired.description: Whether user checkboxes are required on the input before form submission.
isRequired.description_zh: 在提交表单之前，输入是否需要用户复选框。

isReadOnly.description: Whether the checkboxes can be selected but not changed by the user.
isReadOnly.description_zh: 复选框是否可以被选中，但不能由用户更改。

isInvalid.description: Whether the radio group is invalid.

validationState.description: Whether the inputs should display its "valid" or "invalid" visual styling. (**Deprecated**) use **isInvalid** instead.
validationState.description_zh: 输入是否应显示其“有效”或“无效”的视觉样式。（**已弃用**）请改用 **isInvalid**。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the animation should be disabled.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the radio group slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为单选按钮组插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: Radio group root wrapper, it wraps the label and the wrapper.
slots.description_zh: 单选组根包装器，它包装标签和包装器。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: Radio group wrapper, it wraps all Radios.
slots.description_zh: 无线电组包装器，它包装所有无线电。

slots.name: label
slots.description: Radio group label, it is placed before the wrapper.
slots.description_zh: 单选按钮组标签，它被放置在包装器之前。

slots.name: description
slots.description: Description slot for the radio group.

slots.name: errorMessage
slots.description: Error message slot for the radio group.
slots.description_zh: 无线电组的错误消息插槽。
